topic.title: Which FF extensions are your favorite?
topic.body:
Which FF extensions are your favorite?

I like:
uBlock Origin
Decentraleyes
Disable WebRTC
Consistent HTTPS
AdBlocker for Youtube
YouTube Plus

https://addons.mozilla.org

topic.title: How to load FF from RAM?
This forum is outdated
topic.body: Example, You can not mute users posts, you can not follow new posts. Until admin upgrade the zite from the menu, better to ask at [ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT) or [search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Page:zite-list-searches) for another forum.
